page.title: 09A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I laid the table and my dad put the porridge out. After breakfast we got in the car. My mum drove it. My dad stayed at home to keep the dog and cat in and feed them. We dropped Stephen, Derek and Esther off at the bus stop. My mum then took Debbie and I to school. While we waited for the rest of the children to come, we had a little play. Soon we went in to work. Later we went out to play again. My friends and I played a{game of {spying.}We had a lot of fun playing that. The bell went so we all had to line up. Debbie was playing with someone else. At home my mum was probably{making bread}or doing the ironing. My dad was at work. We went in and did more school work until it was dinner time.
